KnowledgeBase.Title: Example Boolean compareLT 009
KnowledgeBase.RelatedFunctions: compare compareEQ compareNE compareGE compareGT compareLE

Example.Description: These examples use the compareLT function to determine whether the first object has a lesser value than the second object. The compareLT function returns the Boolean value, true or false.

Syntax.Note: The Boolean value false has a state value of 1.
The result from the &#62 operation is also the value 1.
